name: McpModuleApi
description: MCPサーバー用のモジュール情報を提供するAPIを追加するプラグインです

scripts.package: rm -rf build/ && npm run setup && npm run build:app
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync && npm run release:commit
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync && npm run release:commit
scripts.release:major: npm version mejor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync && npm run release:commit

author: com.appleple
